question:
####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
What happens if DJ Fenris is flipped facedown by [Apocalypse](/en/card/09030)?
answer:
The identity remains hosted on DJ Fenris but has no effect on the game as it is not active. If DJ Fenris is turned back faceup, it will have the text of the hosted identity again.

What happens if DJ Fenris is blanked by [Dr. Lovegood](/en/card/09042)?
